p: The essential oils from the leaves of seven aromatic plants were obtained by hydrodistillation using a Clevenger−type apparatus, in yields of 0.01 to 0.2%, on a weight basis. The oils were tested against standard strains and clinical isolates of multi−resistant bacteria related to foodborne diseases ( Table 1), obtained at the Veterinary Hospital of the Universidade Federal de Mato Grosso do Sul (HV-UFMS).
